tool_description: Roll any number of dice and get a random number.  Also use this api to pick any number of cards from  a deck
name: RollDice
title: RollDice

api_list.name: To Roll more than one dice
api_list.description: This endpoint can be used to roll more than one dice and return a result
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rolldice.p.rapidapi.com/rolldice/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rolldice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rolldice.p.rapidapi.com/rolldice/{noofdice}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rolldice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: To pick more than one card from a deck
api_list.description: This API is used to pick more than one card from a deck
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rolldice.p.rapidapi.com/pickanycard/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rolldice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: To play Rock, Paper and Scissor
api_list.description: This end point used to play rock , paper and scissor.

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rolldice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: To Roll a dice
api_list.description: Call this endpoint to roll a dice . it will return a number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rolldice.p.rapidapi.com/rolldice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rolldice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
